name: Slipi
description:
Navigate each piece to its corresponding goal in this simple mobile-style puzzle game.

arrow keys/WASD: slide pieces
R: restart level
space/enter: continue (after having finished a level)
esc/backspace: exit level

My first attempt at a puzzle game. Made for Game Off 2019.
Please note that save data is not implemented, so leaving the page will erase your progress.
